metadata.name: Elle: 70 years from now
metadata.description:
It's 2093. Elle is 3 years old. 

AI and photography have become ever more intertwined. Cameras the size of biscuits now come with the option to apply filters and auto-perfect features upon image capture itself! Elle’s bright blonde locks are unusually luscious and long for a 3-year old per today’s standards, but thanks to strictly regulated genetic engineering technology, her parents ensured that their precious daughter was born with perfect hair and features.

Elle is holding her favorite object, but what is it?  
Well, if you were to go back to the 1950s with a smartphone and show it to a person from that time, what kind of answer would you expect? Even the most well traveled, educated and open-minded person would be at a loss to imagine the existence of such a device in such a compact design! 

I leave you to imagine what this glowing orb could be.


About the process  
‘70 years from now’ is an AI-generated image that was created using a photograph of my niece Ellie as a reference, which was taken in 2022. The subject’s position, general physical characteristics, posture and lighting were conserved as much as possible and transposed to the era in which the AI output is based. The idea behind this work is to be able to use AI to recreate visions from the past, and to imagine scenarios from the future based on visuals from the present.


Attributes  
AI Generator: Midjourney and Wombo Dream  
Creator: Sanqueira  
Location of reference photograph: Clichy-sous-Bois, France  
Year take: 2022  
Year Created: 2023  
Edition: 1/1  
Dimensions (pixels): 2363 x 3543
